column1: Combine: Lesser Potion + 2 Forest Crystals + Specific
Combine: Lesser Potion +1 + 2 Earth Crystals + Specific
Combine: Lesser Potion +1 + 2 Earth Crystals + Specific

The Alchemist can provide you with potions to boost your Heroes' stats permanently. There is no level requirement for a Hero to use a potion. There are 10 potions that can be crafted, five are unlocked at level 10 and 5 at level 30. 8 of these potions (12 after Prestige) can be used on a Hero total. Listed below are the items you can craft:
Combine: Major Potion + 5 Water Crystals + Specific
Combine: Major Potion +1 + 2 Necro Crystals + Specific
